description: Go to bed before 11:00 PM
Take a picture of a sunset
Make a small present for your friend without a reason
Try a new cooking recipe
Meditate for at least 10 minutes
Call your family
Eat your breakfast in bed
Spend 20 minutes reading poetry out loud
Write down at least five things you feel gratitude for
Find a song you liked in adolescence and sing it like in karaoke
Send a short letter to future You in one year using futureme.org
Watch an old classic movie of your favorite genre
Spend an hour playing a new trending computer/video/mobile game
Go for a walk to the nearest park
Send 10$ to any charity organization you trust
Find out a new podcast and listen to a first episode
Quit social media for at least one day
Write down at least five things you are good at
Take a cold shower
Clean up your laptop and mobile screens
Pick up at least ten stuff you don't use and donate/sell/recycle them
Smile to a stranger
Taste something you've never tried before
Write down your five best guesses about the future and send them to future You in five years using futureme.org
Order take away meal from your favorite restaurant
Find out more about an artist you know the name but haven't seen their work
Play drawasaurus.org with your friends online
Take a picture of the most beautiful building on your street
Do you morning exercise for at least 20 minutes
Become a patron for a creator you like on patreon.com or a similar service
